hero.title: DISCOVER THE ADVENTURE
hero.subtitle: Discover Tenerife in a unique way with our exciting buggy rides. Explore routes full of adventure and fun that adapt to your preferences. Enjoy an excursion to the Teide, a ride along the coast, or a sunset viewpoint, choose from our varied tours. Choose from our varied tours and book your buggy tour experience in Tenerife now!

products.title: OUR TOURS
products.subtitle: Enjoy the magic of Mallorca through our experiences designed for you, with the company of our expert local guides.

info.mainTitle: Important information to keep in mind
info.subtitle1: Bring warm clothes although the company will have one for your use. It would be advisable to wear comfortable clothes and closed shoes for any of our tours.
info.subtitle2: If you are going to drive the buggy, you must have a valid driver's license on the day of the excursion, otherwise the activity will not take place.
info.subtitle3: When we are doing a route through natural environments we have to be aware of the impact we can generate and we must try to leave the environment as we found it.

cta.title: THE TOP BUGGY EXPERIENCE
cta.subtitle: Tenerife's landscapes are truly breathtaking, from the golden sandy beaches to the majestic peaks of the Teide National Park, home to Spain's highest peak.

about.title: ABOUT US
about.subtitle: Tenerife, with a fascinating history dating back centuries, has become a renowned tourist treasure. Tenerife is not only a tourist destination, but a place full of history, culture and natural beauty that guarantees unforgettable experiences for those who are fortunate enough to explore its wonders.
about.paragraph1: We are a family business rooted in the heart of Tenerife, dedicated to offering exciting experiences to explore the island. Discover Tenerife through our exciting routes and buggy rides designed for two and four occupants. We are passionate about sharing the highlights of our environment, giving you an unforgettable experience while exploring breathtaking places on the island. Immerse yourself in the beauty of its landscapes and take advantage of the pleasant climate that this unique destination has to offer. Discover the Teide, beaches and viewpoints. Explore the south of Tenerife with us and live memorable moments!

faq.title: FREQUENT QUESTIONS
faq.subtitle: These are the most common questions asked by our customers

question1.title: How long does the buggy Tour last?
question1.answer: Our buggy tour in Teide has an approximate duration of 4 hours. Enough time to experience the thrill of driving a buggy, and to enjoy and explore a breathtaking environment.

question2.title: What is Top Buggy Adventure cancellation policy?
question2.answer: At Top Buggy Adventure, we know that your plans could change. Therefore, cancellation or changes are free of charge up to 48 hours in advance and receive a full refund.

question3.title: What is the minimum age to participate in our buggy excursions?
question3.answer: The minimum age to drive a buggy is 21 years old and a valid driver's license type B with a minimum of 3 years old is required. If you are going to participate in our excursion as a companion, the minimum age is 7 years old.

question4.title: Are pick-up and return transportation to the hotel included in the price?
question4.answer: Yes, the price includes pick-up and return transportation to the hotels in the South Zone of the island, although it is optional, clients can go to the meeting point, as long as they arrive at least 30 minutes before the starting time of the Tour.

contact.title: CONTACT WITH US
contact.subtitle: Do not hesitate to contact us with any questions you may have. Our team will be happy to help you with whatever you need and answer all your questions.

form.name: Name
form.validation: The field is mandatory and must be valid.

cookies.modified: This document was last modified on
cookies.description: Cookie is a file that is downloaded to your computer when you access certain web pages. Cookies allow a website, among other things, to store and retrieve information about the browsing habits of a user or their equipment and, depending on the information they contain and the way you use your equipment, they can be used to recognize to user. The user's browser stores cookies on the hard drive only during the current session, taking up minimal memory space and not harming the computer. Cookies do not contain any specific personal information, and most of them are deleted from the hard drive at the end of the browser session (so-called session cookies).
cookies.browser: Most browsers accept cookies as standard and, independently of them, allow or prevent temporary or memorized cookies in the security settings.
cookies.acceptance: Without your express consent (by activating cookies in your browser) the data stored in the cookies will not be linked to your personal data provided at the time of registration or purchase.
cookies.description1: They are those that allow the user to navigate through a web page, platform or application and use the different options or services that exist there, such as, for example, controlling traffic and data communication, identifying the session, accessing to parts with restricted access, remember the elements that make up an order, carry out the purchase process of an order, make the request for registration or participation in an event, use security elements during navigation, store content for the dissemination of videos or sound or share content through social networks.
cookies.description2: They are those that allow the user to access the service with some general characteristics, predefined based on a series of criteria on the user's terminal such as, for example, the language, the type of browser through which the service is accessed, the locale from where you access the service, etc.
cookies.description3: They are those that, whether treated by us or by third parties, allow us to quantify the number of users and thus carry out the measurement and statistical analysis of the use made by users of the service offered. To do this, your navigation on our website is analyzed in order to improve the offer of products or services that we offer.
cookies.description4: They are those that, whether treated by us or by third parties, allow us to manage in the most efficient way possible the offer of advertising spaces on the website, adapting the content of the advertisement to the content of the requested service or to the use made. of our website. To do this, we can analyze your Internet browsing habits and we can show you advertising related to your browsing profile.
cookies.description5: They are those that allow the management, in the most efficient way possible, of the advertising spaces that, where appropriate, the editor has included in a web page, application or platform from which the requested service is provided. These cookies store information on user behavior obtained through continuous observation of their browsing habits, which allows the development of a specific profile to display advertising based on it.
cookies.description6: The website may use third-party services that, on behalf of this website, will collect information, for statistical purposes, on the use of the site by the user and for the provision of other services related to the activity of this website and other Internet services.
cookies.analytics: In particular, this website uses Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google, Inc., domiciled in the United States, with headquarters at 1600 Amphitheater Parkway, Mountain View, 94043, California. To provide these services, they use cookies that collect information, including the user's IP address, which will be transmitted, processed and stored by Google in the terms established on its website, including the possible transmission of said information to third parties for reasons of legal requirement or when said third parties process the information on behalf of Google.
cookies.agree: The user expressly accepts, by using this site, the processing of the information collected in the manner and for the purposes mentioned above. And, you also acknowledge that you are aware of the possibility of rejecting the processing of such data or information by rejecting the use of cookies by selecting the appropriate settings for this purpose in your browser, although this option to block cookies in your browser may not allow you to do so. the full use of all the functionalities of the website.
cookies.permit: You can allow, block or delete cookies installed on your computer by configuring the browser options installed on your computer:
cookies.update: If we decide to change our cookie policy we will update the modification date of this document.
cookies.contact: How to get in touch with us
cookies.questions: If you have any questions about this cookie policy, you can contact us through the mechanisms available in our contact section.

privacy.personal: Through this website, personal data necessary for the management and maintenance of some of our services is collected. Without prejudice to the purposes indicated in each case, said information will be kept and managed with due confidentiality, applying the computer security measures established in the applicable legislation to prevent access or improper use of your data, its manipulation, deterioration or loss. At any time you can exercise your rights of access, rectification or cancellation in relation to said data, directing your request to the address of the owner of the files. You can find forms for exercising your rights on the website of the
privacy.file: Sus datos se incorporarán a un fichero inscrito en el Registro General del Protección de Datos, responsabilidad de Touradvisor DMC SLU, , con domicilio en Ctra. valldemossa km7.4 – Parc Bit, Ed. Disset, pl
privacy.data: Your data will be used to contact you, if you request it, or to make a request for information or to reserve one of the services offered. This process may involve the transfer of your data to third parties directly related to the provision of the service. This transfer of data will only occur when it is essential.
privacy.userinfo: We collect information from you when you register on our site or subscribe to our newsletter. When placing an order or registering on our site, where applicable, you may be asked to enter your name, email address or telephone number. It is possible, however, to visit our site anonymously.
privacy.use: What do we use your information for?
privacy.infostatement: La información que obtenemos de usted puede ser utilizada de una de las siguientes maneras:
privacy.explanation1: Your information helps us better respond to your individual needs.
privacy.explanation2: We continually improve our website offer based on the information and feedback we receive from you.
privacy.explanation3: Your information helps us respond more effectively to customer service requests and support requests.
privacy.explanation4: The email address you provide for order processing may be used to send information and updates pertaining to your order, as well as receive company news, updates, related product or service information from time to time, etc.
privacy.note: Note: If at any time you would like to stop receiving future emails, unsubscribe instructions are included at the bottom of each email.
privacy.protect: How do we protect your information?
privacy.security: In accordance with applicable law, we implement various security measures to maintain the integrity of your personal information when you enter, submit or access your personal information.
privacy.where: , where their use on our website is established.
privacy.disclose: Do we disclose information to third parties?
privacy.text: We do not sell, trade with, or transfer your personal data to third parties. This does not include trusted third parties who assist us in operating our website, managing our business, or providing a service to you, so long as such parties agree to maintain the confidentiality of such information. We may also release your information when we believe release is necessary to comply with the law, enforce our site policies, or protect our property, safety or rights or those of third parties. However, non-personally identifiable information about your visit may be provided to third parties for marketing, advertising or other uses.
privacy.explanation5: This online privacy policy applies only to information collected through our website and not to information collected through other means.
privacy.info: , which establishes the use, disclaimers and limitations of liability that govern the use of our website.
privacy.change: If we decide to change our privacy policy we will update the modification date of this document.
privacy.contact: How to get in touch with us
privacy.questions: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, you can contact us through the mechanisms available in our contact section
